snippet: The Packers, one of the league’s preseason favorites, avoided an 0-2 start with a 23-10 home victory over their conference rivals the Bears.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Green Bay Packers defeat Chicago Bears, 23-10, in Week 2 action; other news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Packers, one of the league’s preseason favorites, avoided an 0-2 start with a 23-10 home victory over their conference rivals the Bears.

headline.main: Green Bay Roughs Up Chicago for First Win
headline.print_headline: Green Bay Roughs Up Chicago for First Win
